column5: Great new contest for 2 tickets to the BassTalk Seminars!!  Click in the link below to enter!
O sorry I did not see the "B" I was going to eat some beans and win the contest.  Art
Aplumma, is that a diner table boat in your avatar ? lol..
Great prize boss. Are the tickets good for any of the dates? I,ll be heading to Ward Edmounds for the Bass Talk.
Bass fear me! sometimes so bad they don`t come near my line!
Sounds like a great way to spend the day, sadly I am working so I won't take away another persons chance at it.  Dang job  Maureen
The Tickets are good for any of the sessions...

Get your name in there Maureen it will be a good time with a ton of information. Hopefully you can arrange a day off , there are 5 different dates for the events. If you can't then you are working way too much  Brian, how have you been?? That is a great location to pick, a ton of great speakers and topics.  JP

The speakers and topics are different for each session! The topics are varied and should be of interest to anyone who would like to be a better bass angler! If you don't happen to win feel free to purchase a tickets and come out for some fun informative talks! Cheers, Dave
Someone mentions the word BASS, and all the pros come out of hybernation.LOL  Nice to have ya on board Dave.

JP I would love to go, but I'd likely only go to the one in Vaughn, I do enough driving as it is  . As for work, well ya I think I work too much     , but I do work weekends, my days off are during the week.  Good luck to everyone who enters, and don't forget to take notes for the rest of us  Welcome aboard Dave  maureen

Maureen, you are the lucky one. I used to have weekdays off and loved every minute of it. All of the fishing spots had little to no pressure and traffic was better since I would always be going against the grain.  Nothing beats seeing the look on peoples faces when you are headed out with a boat hooked up and they are headed into work!!!  JP

Thanks for the warm welcome! We are going to do the draw Mon. Jan. 29th and announce the winner! We would appreciate it if you don't win and are planning on attending to get your registrations in as soon as possible. This makes it easier on us when it comes to planning the lunch and stuff. Cheers, Dave

Dave, for lunch,  6 pack and 24 wings please.  I was waiting for a confirmation from a buddy before sending in.Will have it off  to you guys next week.   Thanks again to those stepping up and doing these bass talks.
